tool.name: mtbls520_06_import_traits
tool.description: Import and process ecological characteristics file of the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes. ---- Module: Ecological characteristics Description: Import and process ecological characteristics file of the MTBLS520 study. Input parameters: - Input Preprocess Rdata file - Input CSV file containing the ecological characteristics Output parameters: - Preprocess Rdata file: Please connect this Rdata file to the species diversity module of the MTBLS520 workflow. ---- For updates and documentation, please visit: https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520
